data.text: (Knock knock knock)
Trainer-san, pardon the intrusion.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Coming in at this time, is something wrong? 
You're probably tired from the race, is it something urgent?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Coming in at this time, is something wrong? 
You're probably tired from the race, is it something urgent?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
I don't really know if it would be considered urgent, 
but I just wanted to tell you as soon as possible.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
With today's victory, I realized something. 
After all this, I haven't really thanked Trainer-san properly.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: Thanked me…?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Even though I wasn't on your team, 
Trainer-san kindly listened to my worries.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
And when I selfishly asked to transfer to your team, 
Trainer-san accepted.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
If it's that… on the other hand, normally, it wouldn't be 
strange to say I was being meddlesome with another team.
data.name: <username>

data.text: Fufuu…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Since joining ＜Sirius＞, by just looking at the other members I can tell 
what kind of person Trainer-san is.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: You're someone who believes in and kindly supports us.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Thinking that, I wanted to properly thank you, but… 
do you think you can wait just a little bit longer?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: Don't talk about waiting, you don't really need to thank me…
data.name: <username>

data.text: No, I need to properly thank you.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: …from now on, let's see that "scenery" together, how's that?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Saying that, the expression on Silence Suzuka's face was just as 
gentle, and filled with joy, as when she was running.

…If it's that kind of gratitude, then that's another story. 
I'll definitely accept that kind of gratitude.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Let's continue to look for that "scenery"!
Let's continue to look for that "scenery"!

data.text: Yes…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Running as she desired, 
Silence Suzuka achieved her first victory as a member of ＜Sirius＞.

With her in good condition and high spirits, 
what kind of "scenery" will she show me from now on?

With the way she is now, I believe her dreams will continue to 
overflow with these joyful emotions.
